nodes.text: Hail Nine was the callsign assigned to the ninth pilot of the New Republic's Hail Squadron. During the Galactic Civil War, a male pilot was designated this callsign during a battle with the 204th Imperial Fighter Wing over the planet Chadawa, and was seen ejecting when his Y-wing was blown apart by a Raider-class corvette, according to fellow squadron pilot Jiona (Hail Ten).
Hail Nine first appeared in the 2021 novel Victory's Price, written by Alexander Freed.
